resources.string: Password must contain 8 to 16 characters and is case-sensitive.
Password must contain at least two of the following: digits, letters, and symbols.
"The password can't be identical to the username, and must contain 8 to 16 characters from at least two of the following character classes: letters, digits, and symbols."
Account login error. Please try again.
Log in to Flyme account and enable Data Sync. It can store your contacts and messages in the cloud and keep them safe from loss
Log in to Flyme account and enable Phone Finder. It can help you find a lost phone and enhance phone security.
"You won't be able to use all Flyme account services without binding a phone number. Continue?"

You device is disconnected from the internet, so Data Sync, Phone Finder, and other services for Flyme account are unavailable. To enable these services again, please enter the system and log in with your Flyme ID
Download latest version from app store
Auto-login failed. Please try logging in manually

Low security level. Please bond your phone number
After binding your Taobao account, you can keep your data on Flyme and YunOS in sync in the cloud, such as contacts, messages, and call logs.

"• Free cloud storage and unlimited cloud album space • 40 TB cloud storage for free • Log in to Taobao, Tmall and other Alibaba apps without entering passwords • Combine cloud data of Flyme and YunOS"
Link your Taobao account and you will get:
Accessing Yunos service error, please try again

Clear local contacts and other account data
Resetting the password will clear all personal data and applications, including apps, media files, and local backup records, and will exit the current Flyme account. Please be careful
"• Get 1TB storage for free • 360 Cloud Disk will obtain your account's general information • After completing the account information, you can manage your Cloud data on various platforms."
Data & photos in cloud never get lost

Users can get root permission by opening system permissions, but the operation may cause certain risks, including but not limited to failure of Phone Finder, data loss, password disclosure, system performance change, quality instability, and other indirect or consequential damages that can be incurred. In a rooted system, OTA updating will not be supported. For updating, please go to the official website to download the update file.

Please enter the password of Flyme account %s to verify your identity. After this, the lock screen password will be cleared for you to reset

"Your account name must contain 4 to 32 alphanumeric characters or underscores, begin with a letter, and end with a number or letter. It can't be changed once set."
Nickname must be 2-32 characters in length, and consist of English letters, Chinese characters, digits, or underscores. It can only be changed once every 3 months.
Same data such as contacts and messages on both YunOS and Flyme may cause redundant data
"Invalid certificate. Please make sure the phone's date is accurate."

"Note: Users are required to undergo identity authentication in compliance with the Provisions on Administration of Information Services of Mobile Internet Application Programs enacted by the People's Republic of China. We undertake that your personal information will be put under strict protection and disclosed to no third party. Identity information can't be modified once submitted ."

Note: Users are required to undergo identity authentication (PRC I.D. No. is only supported) in compliance with the Provisions on Administration of Information Services of Mobile Internet Application Programs enacted by the People’s Republic of China. In order to confirm the authenticity of the information you submitted, you agree to provide your information to the credit service agency and its cooperating agencies, and agree to authorize the credit service agency and its cooperating agencies to conduct a comparative analysis based on that information provided and to return the result to us.

"I fully understand the losses and damages that could be incurred by using open system permissions, and after careful consideration, decide to use the open system permissions on this mobile phone. Meanwhile, I hereby forfeit Meizu's warranty services for this mobile phone, and agree that Meizu will be free from any liability for any risk or consequence arising from the use of the open system permissions and functions."
